purpose: To provide AI-driven coding assistance within the VSCode environment, streamlining the development process
principle: Utilizes AI models to offer code suggestions, completions, and error detection directly in the VSCode editor
reusability: Available as a VSCode extension, easily installable and configurable through the VSCode marketplace
limitations: Limited to the VSCode environment, may require internet access for AI model queries, and has potential latency issues
